title: IUSF Protestors surround PM’s Wijerama Residence
body_lines: Thousands of students from the Inter University Students Federation who have marched into Colombo calling on the government to resign have surrounded the Prime Minister's residence in Wijerama Road.
The protestors numbering in thousands are chanting slogans for President Gotabaya Rajapaksa and the government to resign due to the ongoing crisis.
Hundreds of police officers have been deployed outside the residence and a tense situation has erupted.
